altername_name: 好想告诉你 - 传递的感情
name: Kimi ni Todoke: Tsutaeru Kimochi
overview: Kimi ni Todoke: Tsutaeru Kimochi 「君に届け ～伝えるキモチ～ meaning "communicating feelings"」 is the second game for Kimi ni Todoke. The story is a continuation of the previous game's Kazehaya route, and follows Sawako in her second year of high school.[1] The story changes depending on the "heart" the player chooses. This game also features more characters.[3] Software Info Publisher: Bandai Namco Games Release Date: 7 April 2011[3] Genre: Pure Adventure that conveys thoughts Players: 1
